long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever went to Sanmar.com and had to manually count how many of each size were available in all warehouses combined. With the current shortages, it has been difficult to make sure that enough of a specific style is available to order. With this extension you will be able to see how many for each size is available in total so you dont have to manually calculate the total number available. Now when a customer tells you the quantity they need, you can tell them just from a glance without having to spend any effort doing any manual calculation.
